data.name: LargeProducerRegister.Title
data.value: W_Public list of large producers on the ‘report packaging data’ service

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.FindOutWhatThisLinkIsForLink
data.value: W_find out what this list is for and how to use it

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.ForAnythingBeforeReportingYear
data.value: W_For anything before reporting year 2023, use the

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.PublicRegisterOfRegisteredProducersLink
data.value: W_Public Register of Registered Producers on the National Packaging Waste Database (NPWD)

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.ListOfLargeProducers
data.value: W_List of large producers - download CSV files

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.TheInformationIsInCsvFiles
data.value: W_The information is in CSV files, depending on which environmental regulator the producer is reporting to

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.ThisInformationIsUsuallyUpdated
data.value: W_This information is usually updated every day.

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.TheListsShowTheInformation
data.value: W_The lists show the information that producers have submitted to the ‘report packaging data’ service. This means that if a producer has submitted errors, the errors will be shown here.

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.SomeFieldsMayBeBlank
data.value: W_Some fields may be blank. This could be because they do not apply to the producer in question.

data.name: LargeProducerRegister.IfYoureUnsureAboutAnything
data.value: W_If you’re unsure about anything, check with the producer directly.
